code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{Navbar}from"../Navbar/Navbar";import{HotelImages}from"../HotelImages/HotelImages";import{HotelDetails}from"../HotelDetails/HotelDetails";import"./SingleHotel.css";import{FinalPrice}from"../FinalPrice/FinalPrice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SingleHotel=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[singleHotel,setSingleHotel]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{(async()=>{try{const{data}=await axios.get("https://travelapp-backend-cdeh.onrender.com/api/hotels/".concat(id));console.log(data);setSingleHotel(data);}catch(err){}})();},[id]);const{city,state}=singleHotel;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"single-hotel-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"hotel-name-address",children:[city,",",state]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotelImages,{singleHotel:singleHotel}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HotelDetails,{singleHotel:singleHotel}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FinalPrice,{singleHotel:singleHotel})]})]})]});};
